mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY wjy DESC) id, wjy as name, COUNT(1) AS ciS, SUM(CASE jycs WHEN 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS jc1, SUM(CASE jycs WHEN 2 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS jc2, SUM(CASE jycs WHEN 3 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS jc3, SUM(CASE jycs WHEN 4 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS jc4 FROM pda_db.dbo.AC_DATA_WG AS w WHERE (wjy IS NOT NULL) GROUP BY wjy
